# python_exp_learning
This repository contains activities for learning  coding skills in python.


# Getting Started

```
>>> conda env create -f env.yaml
```

```
>>> conda activate mathstropy_env_python_310
```

## For Development
Windows
```
>>> pip install -e .[dev]
```

Mac
```
>>> pip install -e .'[dev]'
```

## For Non-Development Purposes
```
>>> pip install -e
```
